citation: Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2006 (Tas)
text:
Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2006

I make, with the agreement of the Minister for Primary Industries and Water, the following order under section 5(3) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

4 August 2006

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2006 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Act applies to certain land
    The Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 is declared to apply to the forest reserves specified in Schedule 1 to this order.

SCHEDULE 1 - Forest Reserves to which Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 applies
